ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the Overturned City which He turned upside down
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And He overthrew the Cities of the Plain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And He brought perdition upon the subverted cities
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is He who turned upside down the people of Lot
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And that it is He Who threw down the upturned townships?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And He destroyed the overthrown cities.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the overthrown cities did He overthrow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the Subverted City He also overthrew,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and He overthrew the subverted cities [of Sodom and Gomorrah]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the subverted cities He overthrew.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and He overthrew the town that was overturned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And He destroyed the Overthrown Cities (of Sodom and Gomorrah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And He destroyed the overthrown cities [of Sodom to which Prophet Lout (Lot) was sent].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And He toppled the ruined cities.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the overturned towns He hurled down
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:53] and the Deviant [cities], namely, the cities of the people of Lot, He overturned, He hurled them down to the earth after lifting them up to the heaven upside down, by commanding Gabriel to do this;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And al-Mu'tafikah He destroyed) and He destroyed the townships of the folk of Lot: Sodom, Sadum, Gomorrah and Sawa'im; al-Mu'tafikat means those that were swallowed up by the earth.
